advanceToNextInsn(MemoryInteractor,uint6.notice: Advances to next instruction by increasing pc

csrEnvTrapIntMmFunct3(MemoryInteractor,u.notice: Given csr env trap int mm funct3 insn, finds the func associated.

envTrapIntGroup(MemoryInteractor,uint32,.notice: Given a env trap int group insn, finds the func associated.

executeArithmeticImmediate(MemoryInterac.notice: Finds and execute Arithmetic Immediate instruction

executeInsn(MemoryInteractor,uint32,uint.notice: Finds associated instruction and execute it.

executeJump(MemoryInteractor,uint64).notice: Execute jump - writes a new pc

fenceGroup(MemoryInteractor,uint32,uint6.notice: Given a fence funct3 insn, finds the func associated.

loadFunct3(MemoryInteractor,uint32,uint6.notice: Given a load funct3 group instruction, finds the function

storeFunct3(MemoryInteractor,uint32,uint.notice: Given a store funct3 group insn, finds the function associated.

userdoc.notice: Finds instructions and execute them or delegate their execution to another library
